Next js in 5 days.name: Next js in 5 days
Next js in 5 days.desc: Next.js is an open-source development framework built on top of Node.js enabling React based web applications functionalities such as server-side rendering and generating static websites.

React in 30 days.name: React in 30 days
React in 30 days.desc: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library. It is extremely useful, and allows developers to create websites quickly and efficiently. Join this course to learn react.

Javascript 101.name: Javascript 101
Javascript 101.desc: Javascript is the language used for building websites, along with HTML and CSS. Learn it to start off with both frontend and backend of web development.

CSS in 20 days.name: CSS in 30 days
CSS in 20 days.desc: CSS or (Cascading Styled Sheets) is the language used for styling your websites, this will increase the user exprience along with the beauty of your website. Join this course to learn CSS

Basic web dev and HTML.name: Basic web dev and HTML
Basic web dev and HTML.desc: In this course you will get an indtroduction of how websites are made, and you will learn HTML or (Hyper text markup language). Join this course and make your first website!
